message.body: Republican texted me back! You were right: Hey Sofie! I've been a little busy with some school applications and work but haven't forgot about that drink - how's your week looking?
Yaaaaaayyy!!!!! That's awesome :) how have you been???
You as well! I came down with a cold last night from my roomAte, yuck! I'll see you tonight at the show opening though! Excited to see your piece!
And by tonight, I meant tomorrow for the show opening... Wrong day! Hehe
